csvs.name: Candlepin-API/get_consumers.csv
csvs.projection: f.element as fact, cp.uuid as consumer_id, t.label as type, o.account as owner, cp.username as username
csvs.from: cp_consumer cp, cp_consumer_facts f, cp_owner o, cp_consumer_type t
csvs.selection: f.cp_consumer_id = cp.id and f.mapkey = 'virt.uuid' and o.id = cp.owner_id and cp.type_id = t.id

csvs.name: Candlepin-API/Virt_Guest.csv
csvs.from: cp_consumer_guests cg, cp_consumer cp1, cp_consumer_facts cf1, cp_consumer cp2, cp_consumer_facts cf2
csvs.selection: cp1.id = cg.consumer_id and cg.guest_id = cf1.element and cf1.mapkey = 'virt.uuid' and cp1.uuid <> cp2.uuid and cp2.id = cf2.cp_consumer_id and cf2.mapkey = 'virt.uuid'

csvs.name: Candlepin-API/consumers_with_ents.csv
csvs.projection: c.uuid as uuid_With_Ent, e.id as entitlement_id

csvs.name: Candlepin-API/Virt_Host.csv
csvs.from: cp_consumer_facts cf, cp_consumer cp, cp_consumer_guests cg
csvs.selection: cp.id = cf.cp_consumer_id and cf.element = cg.guest_id and cg.guest_id <> ''

csvs.name: Candlepin-API/create_consumers_activationkey.csv
csvs.projection: o.account as owner, a.id as activation_key

csvs.name: Candlepin-API/overrides_delete.csv
csvs.projection: o.consumer_id as uuid_with_overrides, o.content_label as override_label, o.name, o.value

csvs.name: Candlepin-API/update_consumers.csv
csvs.projection: a.uuid as uuid, o.account as owner, a.username, a.servicelevel as serviceLevel, concat(a.lastcheckin, '') as lastCheckin
csvs.selection: servicelevel <> '' and o.id = a.owner_id and lastcheckin is not null

csvs.name: Candlepin-API/remove_entitlement.csv
csvs.projection: ent.id as uuid_with_ent, c.uuid as entitlement_id

csvs.name: Candlepin-API/remove_certificate.csv
csvs.projection: c.uuid as uuid_with_serial, concat(cert.serial_id,'') as serial_id
csvs.from: cp_ent_certificate cert, cp_consumer c, cp_entitlement ent
